title: Beautiful 4 BD/3BA Top Unit in Lone Mountain w/ Garage + Laundry!!!
posting_body: ['BEDROOMS', '4 Bed', 'BATHROOMS', '3 Bath', 'DESCRIPTION', 'VIRTUAL TOUR:', 'If the link does not appear below, the platform you are viewing this listing has blocked it from appearing.', 'Please contact us directly for a link to the virtual tour.', '3D Virtual Tour: <URL>', 'Address: 178 Stanyan Street, San Francisco, CA 94118', 'Neighborhood: Inner Richmond', 'Property Type: Multi-Family', 'Bedrooms: 4', 'Bathrooms: 3', 'Kitchen: Stove, Refrigerator, and Dishwasher', 'Parking: 3 car garage', 'Pets: 2 Max, 25lbs or less, $25/mo/pet, no additional deposit', 'Laundry: Onsite', 'Floors: Hardwood', 'Utilities included: None', 'Outdoor space: Backyard with a deck', 'Available: Now', 'FEATURES:', '• Bright space, large windows', '• Top Floor, Two stories', '• Formal Dining Room', '• Sunroom included', '• Spacious walk in closet', '• Gorgeous backyard with a deck', '• Open kitchen with plenty of cabinet space', '• Multiple storage spaces.', 'Multiple closets', 'REQUIREMENTS:', '- Credit: 650 Min', '- Income: 3x the Rent for aggregate household income', '- Guarantors Accepted', '- Security Deposit: 2X the rent, No-Deposit Option Available for Qualified -Renters!', '<URL>)', '- Lease Terms: One year, month to month after', '- Application Fee: $50 per applicant', '- Resident Benefit Package included and required with all leases ($49.50/mo)', 'Unit Description:', 'Magnificent and spacious 3BR/3BA unit in a beautiful conveniently located home in Lone Mountain.', 'Invitingly spacious living and dining room for entertaining guests and hosting dinner parties.', 'Large bay windows can be found in almost every room in the home providing plenty of natural light throughout the day.', 'Hardwood floors throughout all main living areas (living, dining and bedrooms).', 'Plush comfortable carpet in all bonus rooms (leisure, office, family/sun).', 'Modern kitchen with spacious granite counters, gas range and dishwasher.', 'Ample storage is available throughout with multiple walk in closets and built in storage solutions.', 'In home laundry room and attached private four car parking garage.', 'Property Description:', 'If you are looking for convenience, look no further.', 'This lovely home is located in Lone Mountain nestled between Laurel Heights and NOPA (North Panhandle).', 'The Inner Balboa merchant district and the Geary restaurant corridor are within just minutes walking distance opening the door to restaurants, banks, grocers, drug stores, coffee shops, gyms, playgrounds and community centers.', 'Half a block away from the 31 bus line provides quick and direct express service to Downtown and the financial district or walk one additional block to reach the 38 Geary providing similar access, but on a more frequent basis.', 'Quick and direct access to the Golden Gate Bridge, Marin, Sonoma & Napa County is just also minutes away via Park Presidio boulevard.', 'Escape to the seclusion of your back deck and patio or walk a short block to access the amenities of Golden Gate Park.', 'UNIT AMENITIES', 'Balcony, deck, patio, Dishwasher, Fireplace, Hardwood floors, Mirrors, Refrigerator, Stove and oven']
